title: It’s not just you, Slack is down again [U]
content:
Slack is seeing downtime this morning with issues including trouble logging in, sending messages and files, and notifications also not working. Slack is aware of the problems and is “looking into the cause.”

more…

description: Slack is seeing downtime this morning with issues including trouble logging in, sending messages and files, and notifications also not working. Slack is aware of the problems and is “looking into the cause.” Update 6:44 am PT: Slack says “We’re still working towards a full resolution. We’ll be back with another update soon. Thank you […]
